ECC component SCA configuration register type definition

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x20
Size:
0x4

Description

One 4-bit register to enable/disable the ECC SCA countermeasures. bit #0: POINT_RND_EN : ​Indicates if the base point randomization countermeasure is enabled. bit #1: MASK_SIGN_EN: ​Indicates if the mask countermeasure in SIGNING is enabled. bit #2: SCALAR_RND_EN: ​Indicates if the scalar ransomization countermeasure is enabled. bit #3: OPENSSL_EN: ​Indicates if the openssl test is enabled. bit 4 should be deleted after openssl keygen test.

This register is located at ECC_base_address + 0x0000_0020 After each software write, hardware will erase the register.

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:4] - - - -
[3] OPENSSL_EN w 0x0 -
[2] SCALAR_RND_EN w 0x1 -
[1] MASK_SIGN_EN w 0x1 -
[0] POINT_RND_EN w 0x1 -

Field Descriptions

OPENSSL_EN

OPENSSL configuration field

SCALAR_RND_EN

SCA scalar randomization field

MASK_SIGN_EN

SCA mask signing field

POINT_RND_EN

SCA point randomization field
